data.text: @WrecklessGamer Stout acted as if he wanted to engage with people on Twitter at the start until he got caught lying red handed on BBC radio Ulster - then he started using the nuclear block button. Another disgrace to the medical profession.

@WrecklessGamer They lied... people died

Their families need a full inquiry and these so called health experts brought to court
@WrecklessGamer Get them out in May Elections and get they in to Laganside Courts in June!

@MilkwoodPhoto @WrecklessGamer @SDLPlive SDLP got where they are (or more accurately WERE) on the back of the Civil Rights movement, a movement whose ideals they have betrayed and trod upon. In their current form, and with their current WEF-conflicted leadership they are SHAMEFULLY ANTI CIVIL RIGHTS! 😡

@WrecklessGamer The vaccine passports were pushed by the build back better boyos @SDLPlive: https://t.co/b8OupQ5sPi
Who was pulling their strings?
@WrecklessGamer Get it done! Time for the cabal to start squirming.
